评论详情: For two years now I have been looking for the house coat of my dreams. I'm very picky and thought I might have to visit a seamstress to get exactly what I want. Came across this robe. It's absolutely beautiful and warm. I love that the sash is sewn in and it has pockets. Yayyy!

Although I have not purchased this particular product, I  bought a dress with this same fabric and it is beautiful!  It has held up very well.  I have had it for several years. I would highly recommend this company for any plus size shoppers looking for a quality product with consistent sizing.  They have a much larger selection directly on their website including undergarments.Another thing I love about shopping with this company is that they list out the sizing for each item and that is so helpful.
This is the second of these robes that I’ve ordered. The first was lush and regal, this one is thin and cheap. Sorely disappointed in the difference in the quality.
I got it for my mother to replace the velvet robe her mother made for her century ago.  It's absolutely beautiful, and really well made.  She loves it!!
Absolutely beautiful! Thank you so very much for your kindness and consideration which is greatly appreciated.  Much gratitude and many blessings.

评论概述: Not what I was looking for
评论详情: The fabric is thin and it was way to short. I am 5’7, I normally wear a XL. This fit okay but way to short. I returned it

I bought this to use as a costume robe but the quality is really great. I am most appreciative of the sizing. As a plus sized person it isn't always easy to trust the size charts but this one was perfect.  Will be ordering from this company again.
This is overly heavy and isn't comfortable to wear but it's good looking.
Gorgeous color and nice roomy fit. A little too shiny.

I wear a robe everyday, so I’m willing to spend a little more for a nice one. You may be put off by the price, but don’t worry. This robe is amazing. It looks and feels great. I got the purple color, and I am going to order the either the black or green next.

This robe is beautiful. It's heavy, rich in color, soft, the ruching is extremely flattering for the curvy body type, and the attached belt helps give the appearance of a snatched waist. It's the kind of robe that makes you want to paint your nails and curl your hair because it makes you feel pretty. The color definitely doesn't match the photo, but I don't care because I personally think the robe is more true emerald in person than the listing photo anyway. There are some pattern shift lines from what I assume is caused by folding, but it's not a deal breaker. I can't speak to durability, but so far, I'm in love.

评论概述: The soft material is very nice and comfortable!
评论详情: The velvet robe is very comfortable to wear!
This was a Christmas gift to me.  I've been looking for one to replace a previous one.  It is just beautiful with wonderful fabric.  It is everything I wanted in a winter robe.

评论概述: Beautiful…Exactly as I expected! A keeper, for sure.
评论详情: Love the style, the drape of the velour, everything. After seeing it, my daughter wants to order one too.
Fits just I wanted using size guide absolutely love the purple thanks for great quality looking forward to having this a long time (fingers crossed)

I loved it so much I made sure I purchased a couple more because I never wanna be without it!!!! The fit the value the comfort! I even purchased the velvet ones… Truly. Madly. Deeply love this robe!  I'm buying everyone one for the holidays as well!

I got this robe in black velvet about two years ago and I have pretty much worn it every single day for two years. It has held up beautifully and honestly looks as beautiful as the day I bought it, despite being put through the washer and dryer every week.  This is a beautiful, classy robe and very feminine and snuggly. It's also lightweight enough that I wear it in the summer when the house is air conditioned as well.  I love it so much I'm thinking of also getting it in blue velvet. In the past I have never spent this much for a bathrobe but this one is definitely worth the investment.
The built in belt is so convenient. The fabric feels so soft. The color is so rich. The fit is wonderful.
Very classy and classic
I added a couple of snaps to keep the wrap front closed. It's beautiful but not soft inside and really not an everyday wear item.

I had this on my wish list for a while and decided to pull the trigger. Based on some reviews I was worried. I was pleasantly surprised and I love everything about this robe. It's heavy, warm and luxurious. I love the attached belt. Old school elegance at its' finest.

评论概述: Exquisite Robe!  Makes you feel like a queen!
类型: Size: Large TallColor: Deep Royal Blue (Velvet)
评论详情: Gorgeous! Long and I’m 5.10”. Worth every penny!  Will by again for gifts and maybe another for me.

My husband purchased this for my birthday (it was on my Wish List) and I was so surprised and pleased... until I unfolded it and felt how thin the fabric was. Not at all the weight and luxury a $100+ velvet robe should feel like. This is maybe a $25 robe at Walmart cheap I was so disappointed and my poor husband felt so bad when I asked him to return it. I wouldn't normally spend that kind of money on a bathrobe, but if I do I expect it to at least feel like velvet and not bristly. Don't waste your money, there are much better quality robes out there for the cost.
Love this housecoat! Beautiful rich purple color. Soft warm and comfortable. Love the longer length. Worth the price paid. Great quality!

I called the company before ordering. They were very responsive and helpful in my decision about what size to order and offered to alter the length or add inside ties if I wanted to place a special order. The bathrobe shipped in a smaller Fed Ex envelope then I would have expected and I was concerned that it would be permanently creased however I was pleasantly surprised to find that find that there wasn't a wrinkle in it which speaks to the quality of the velvet fabric used. I am very happy with my purchase as is my husband!
Loved everything about this!

I feel Glamorous!!!  I bought purple large. I am 5’ and weigh 150lbs 40 D bra.I usually would order an xl but I didn’t want to have to hem it.It is perfect!  Love the deep purple, love the sewn on waistband in the back!!  Looks heavenly!!

This was a great purchase. Bought it for my mom, it’s her favorite she wears it every night around the house. The color is perfect, the fit is perfect, and the feel is amazing. Overall great purchase!

评论概述: Very thin material.  I am waiting on my refund.
评论详情: The robe is so thin you can see through it.  It would be ok in a warm climate.  I returned it via UPS, the seller received it on October 1st, I am waiting on my refund.  I will keep you updated on my progress.
This is exactly what I’ve been searching the internet for for a long time! Retro style and super comfy and gorgeous! Also…POCKETS!!! I feel fancy AF when I do laundry now. ;)
Bought it as a gift for my mom and she loved it. It fit her loosely as we sized up and she adores it.

Where do I begin? This robe is dreamy! I’m 5’8” and the length reaches to my ankles - exactly what I wanted. It’s warm but not bulky, it feels luxurious and soft, like I’m wearing something from the Hollywood glamour period. The seams are not rigid and I can’t even feel them. The quality of the material and craftsmanship is superb. Love it!!!

Stunning robe! Wonderful Roomie fit, I am 6'1 and 330lb got a 5x tall n it was too big for my taist. Very flattering, Luscious fabric. Once I return my blue one I'm going to get the purple one I find I don't like how I look in the blue. Then I'm going to have a friend line it with something fluffy, I live in a cold place. This is a wonderful but. Strong, will last the test of time and certainly will never go out of style!
It’s nice to have a robe that is long enough! Great fabric.

So I bought another robe from this co. while I was pregnant and absolutely loved it. It was their cotton blend and it flowed and fit perfectly. I’ve lost weight and always had my eye on this blue velvet one. They didn’t have my size listed at first but I contacted the co. and they quickly met my needs. I just love it. Everyone who sees it comments on how pretty is. Like I said, the fit and flow, not to mention the color is fabulous. It makes me feel glamorous as soon as I wake up. Feminine. So comfortable. I’m beyond impressed with this company and will forever be a customer. I’m 5’4 130ish lbs and bought the medium.

Love this I am 5’8” 36DD bust I got large tall . Wrap around perfect fit. Length well below ankle.  Black velvet lovely. Great quality. Extra long belt is classic can knot or tie a bow. Very happy with my purchase. Pricey but worth it because ideal fit

This robe is gorgeous: the material is thick and lustrous, the design is flattering, the color (I bought the green) is rich and vibrant. That said, I had to return it as it was too heavy for my comfort to wear. The seller issued my refund quickly (there was a $5 restocking fee) so I would buy from them again. If you're looking for a warm, elegant dressing gown this will answer your search.
I really liked the style and fabric of this robe. It feels very luxurious without a really high price. The fit was fine.

I am so pleased with this green velvet robe! I read all of the reviews and I read the size chart over and over again and I looked up reviews based on height and weight and I was very nervous about ordering a 1x because normally I am a 2X or even sometimes as 3x but the 1X fits me like it was made for me. I have a 44 double-D  breast measurement ,  and I am apple shaped if that helps anybody LOL And the color is a perfect deep blue green dark teal. I absolutely love it. The belt is attached so I don't have to worry about trying to find it, and there's a little bit of stretch to the fabric. I am thrilled with this purchase!

I absolutely love it, it absolutely fits and I am very happy! It was hard for me to even find a large-sized ankle or floor length housecoat, and I really actually was looking for an actual "Dressing Gown" Like was worn in the Glamour days of Hollywood. Your product was exactly what I was looking for and I ordered the 2X in royal blue. Your product did not disappoint. Fits, is roomy, but not too roomy, hits me about ankle length and sleeves are perfect. The deep pockets are really nice and the attached waist tie is great too. The velveteen fabric in deep royal blue has a bit of sparkle to it, but not too much as to be flashy - it's just right! Thanks for making an ol' fat girl feel a little glamorous! (For those who will ask: I am 5'7" and 265lbs with a 52" chest - the 2x fits me wonderfully)

评论概述: Stunning Robe in Vibrant, Rich Color
评论详情: This robe is stunning! The color is bright and vibrant and the cut is complementary. I ordered an XL and it was huge on me, so recommend that you size up at least one size. I ended up giving it as a gift to my sister who loves it. Will order a smaller one for myself soon. Highly recommend this robe.
Fabric is thin and it does not feel like actual velvet—more like a thin velour. Robe fits ok. Disappointing quality.

评论概述: Buy it larger to get the flowy effect

Quite disappointed that this robe was made upside-down...the nap should pat down, not up!  When I stroke the fabric, it feels rough, not soft or smooth or expensive, and it was expensive for me...worked hard to convince my husband I needed anything that came to more than $100 after tax...he finally agreed, and the damn nap is upside down!

评论概述: Warm your self in warmth and royalty 'purple'
评论详情: Even though a bit large it is a great product well made. Probably should order true to your size. Fabric nice color great.
Ok

评论概述: NOT Emerald. Returned Item but seller didn't refund.
评论详情: The robe that arrived was not emerald in color at all. It is teal. The stitching on the back is also extremely uncomfortable to wear, it makes the robe cute from the outside but the stitching is excessive and very uncomfortable to wear. Since the robe is both not the color shown/advertised and is uncomfortable I was sad to have to return it. The seller made me pay for return shipping for a falsely advertised item. The product has now been back in the seller's possession for about 3 weeks and still they have not refunded the purchase price even though I filled out their return slip exactly as requested. Terrible experience all around. Hopefully the seller has enough integrity to at least refund the purchase price to my credit card. Pictures posted of their "emerald" robe on a true emerald velvet couch to show their advertisement is false. The color is still beautiful, I will say that; but it is not at all what is shown in the seller's photos.
